name: Creativa BookWorm
description:
The game consists in connecting letters to form words. From a grid of available letters, players connect letters to form words. As words are formed, they are removed from the grid and the remaining letters collapse to fill the available space.
***If you have a request to add more new features to the game or if you have some ideas or suggestion to improve the game, just ask them to ventas@creativaperu.com, and we will work in them.
